sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Two consolatory letters written to the right honorable the Countess of Westmorland The first upon the occasion of the death of Sr Roger Townshend, Baronet: the second upon the death of Mrs Anne Cartwright, Her Honour's children by Sir Roger Townshend, Baronet, her former husband. Hodges, Thomas, d. 1688.
2, 5-32 p.
printed by A. Maxwell, for Samuel Gellibrand at the Golden Ball in St. Paul's Churchyard, London : 1669.
Each letter signed by Thomas Hodges. Imperfect? Pgs. 2 and 3 lacking or not microfilmed. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
Two consolatory letters written to the right honorable the Countess of Westmorland The first upon the occasion of the death of Sr Roger Townshend, Baronet: the second upon the death of Mrs Anne Cartwright, Her Honour's children by Sir Roger Townshend, Baronet, her former husband. Hodges, Thomas, d. 1688.
2, 5-32 p.
printed by A. Maxwell, for Samuel Gellibrand at the Golden Ball in St. Paul's Churchyard, London : 1669.
Each letter signed by Thomas Hodges. Imperfect? Pgs. 2 and 3 lacking or not microfilmed. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Samuel Gellibrand
A. Maxwell
the Golden Ball in St. Paul's Churchyard
